name: Cubo Fight
description:
Cubo Fight is a card game with the characters from Cubo Guys Game.

The game is just a prototype right now, but I wanted to share it with you.

How to play:

You select 5 cards at the start and get into the battle. You play your cards, and the randomizer selects health, attack or defence.  Then the greater one wins the tour.

Also of you have 5 of the same card, you can select them and upgrade. And you can buy new cards for 5 coins.
